feed.title: DaVe's github pages
feed.subtitle: This Github pages site is for all private projects of Kim David Hauser.ch You will find a broad variety of source code for the last 20 years of my Software development process. You are free to leav a feedback or update.

entry.title: Unreal Engine - WeaponSysBasePlugin
entry.summary:
The UE4 WeaponSysBase Plugin provides you with many base classes and features to quickly and easily creating and implementing your own weapon system for your Unreal Engine Game
Description The “Weapon System Base” provides you with some very basic and useful classes and features to create your own Weapon System for a UE4 game. You’ll find base classes for WeaponTypes, Weapons, Projectiles as w...

entry.title: Unreal Engine - PlayerStartPlugin
entry.summary:
Introduction
PlayerStartPlugin in the WorldSettings Editor
The PlayStartPlugin for Unreal Engine version 4 or 5 enables you to easily setup, manage and switch between multiple PlayerStarts for your Maps / Levels in a Game. This is done via the WorldSettings in the Editor Outliner.
Description You can inherit your Projects WorldSettings Class from the custom PlayerStartWorldSettings class pro...

entry.title: Welcome to DaVe's github pages
entry.summary:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.
Jekyll requires blog post files to be named according to the following format:
YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MAR...

entry.title: My online movies
entry.summary:

entry.title: macOS - iVaccination Game
entry.summary:
Introduction
First level of iVaccination game
The world needs your help! Save the world population … The world needs you as it’s suffering a deadly disease … take action now!
